mapper.select: insert attendees (id, kidId, userId,eventId, seq, createdTime,lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{kidId},#{userId},#{eventId}, #{seq}, now(),now())
update attendees set rank=#{rank}, score=#{score}, status=#{status} where id = #{id};
update attendees set name=#{name}, seq=#{seq}, kidId=#{kidId}, userId=#{userId}, eventId=#{eventId}, rank=#{rank}, score=#{score}, status=#{status} where id = #{id};
select * from attendees where eventId = #{eventId} and status > 0
select * from attendees where eventId = #{eventId} and status = 0
